extension.name: Extension README
extension.description: Display extension README during extension management operations (i.e. install, enable, disable, uninstall, update). Also allows an extension to include a functional Markdown document in it's user interface.
extension.comments: This extension is pretty basic and doesn't use any recently added "stuff". I wouldn't be surprised if it works without issue on any currently active installation of CiviCRM. If you find a version incompatibility, please let me know so I can update the requirements. Thanks!
